briefTitle: Metoclopramide for Migraine: A Dose Finding Study

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* acute migraine

Exclusion Criteria:

* secondary cause of headache
* lumbar puncture
* allergy or intolerance to study medication

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Intensity Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in 11 point pain intensity score between baseline and one hour. At both baseline and one hour, all patients were asked to describe their pain on a scale from 0 to 10, with 0 signifying no pain and 10 signifying the worst pain imaginable. Therefore, the CHANGE in pain score could range from -10 through 10.
